required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Vitamin B12 Treatment in Singers
clinical_study.official_title: Vitamin B12 Treatment in Singers - Assessment of Effects Exploratory Pilot Study

brief_summary.textblock: In this study, the investigators aim to assess if vitamin B12 treatment demonstrates a beneficial effect on voice performance. If so, they wish to examine the relationship between the vitamin B12 treatment and the study participant's general well-being.

detailed_description.textblock: Through the investigators' experience, they have observed that amongst singers and voice professionals, there is a common belief that there are voice benefits from cobalamin treatment. Consequently, some singers and voice professionals tend to ask for cobalamin injections in order to enhance their vocal performance. However, there are no previous reports that illustrate the effects of vitamin B12 deficiency or treatment on voice performance.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the Ability to Sing Easily (EASE) - Change
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 1 Hr Post-Injection, 3 Hrs Post-Injection, 24 Hrs Post-Injection, 72 Hrs Post-Injection, 1 Wk Post-Injection
primary_outcome.description: 1 = Not at All, 2 = Mildly, 3 = Moderately, 4 = Extremely

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 1 Hr Post-Injection, 3 Hrs Post-Injection, 24 Hrs Post-Injection, 72 Hrs Post-Injection, 1 Wk Post-Injection
primary_outcome.description: 0 = Never, 1 = Almost Never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Almost Always, 4 = Always

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 1 Hr Post-Injection, 3 Hrs Post-Injection, 24 Hrs Post-Injection, 72 Hrs Post-Injection, 1 Wk Post-Injection
primary_outcome.description: The scale asks, "How confident are you that your voice will do what you need it to do right now?"; 0 = Not Confident At All, 10 = Extremely Confident

primary_outcome.measure: Vocal Fold Swelling (Bastian et al., 2009) - Change
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 1 Hr Post-Injection, 3 Hrs Post-Injection, 24 Hrs Post-Injection, 72 Hrs Post-Injection, 1 Wk Post-Injection
primary_outcome.description: Happy Birthday, Staccato, Trill; 1 = Poor, 5 = Average, 10 = Excellent

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 1 Hr Post-Injection, 3 Hrs Post-Injection, 24 Hrs Post-Injection, 72 Hrs Post-Injection, 1 Wk Post-Injection
primary_outcome.description: 0 = Never, 1 = Almost Never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Almost Always, 4 = Always

secondary_outcome.measure: Short Warwick-Edinburgh Mental Wellbeing Scale (SWEMWBS) - Change
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 1 Hr Post-Injection, 3 Hrs Post-Injection, 24 Hrs Post-Injection, 72 Hrs Post-Injection, 1 Wk Post-Injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients Health Questionnaire-9 for Depression - Change
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 1 Hr Post-Injection, 3 Hrs Post-Injection, 24 Hrs Post-Injection, 72 Hrs Post-Injection, 1 Wk Post-Injection

arm_group.description: Normal Saline Solution (0.9% Sodium Chloride), Once

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Aged 18 to 65 years old
- An active singer who is presently singing
- Willing and able to comply with the study requirements
- Completed and signed an informed consent form.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known vitamin B12 deficiency
- Active or recent vitamin B12 treatment (the subject must not receive vitamin B12 treatment for at least 4 weeks)
- Any known bleeding disorder
- Any known laryngeal pathology
- Plans to start any new treatment, oral/parenteral anticoagulant, supplement, or medication during the study period
- Scored above the highest 10 percentile of performance in all three voice evaluation questionnaires will be withdrawn from the study before the first injection (i.e., scored less than or equal to 7 in the Voice Fatigue Index (VFI), less than or equal to 6 in the Evaluation of the Ability to Sing Easily (EASE), and less than or equal to 4 in the Singing Voice Handicap Index 10 (SVHI-10))

facility.name: Keck Medicine of USC - Downtown Los Angeles
